snippet: The revised route for the Keystone XL pipeline avoids the environmentally sensitive Sand Hills region of Nebraska and restarts the clock on the review process.
abstract: TransCanada, company behind the disputed Keystone XL pipeline, submits a new application for the project to the State Department; company will route the pipeline around the environmentally sensitive Sand Hills region of Nebraska.
lead_paragraph: The revised route for the Keystone XL pipeline avoids the environmentally sensitive Sand Hills region of Nebraska and restarts the clock on the review process.

headline.seo: TransCanada Submits New Application for Keystone Project
headline.main: New Application Is Submitted for Keystone Pipeline
headline.print_headline: New Application Is Submitted for Keystone Pipeline
